@ojrask @sarah_edo @benbyford @joeflateau The consideration of selecting vendors that you believe will stick around is wise. I'd challenge the comparison of back office complexities though. And also ask what levels of expertise and SLAs most internal teams have in place, who need to assure all these home-made services.
